title: Don't F**K With Cats (Patreon Bonus Episode)
description:
The internet is the wild west, you guys. But even the GD no-rules internet has one actual rule. SAY IT WITH ME: Don't fuck with cats. So when a weird looking sicko starts uploading cat-murder videos to the internet, a band of internet sleuths set out to identify him. AND. THEY. ARE. BAD. ASS.

This is episode 1 of our 3-part coverage. The second two episodes are available RIGHT NOW AND AD-FREE on Patreon. There you'll also get over 100 FULL BONUS EPISODES TO BINGE RIGHT NOWÂ Including our episode-by-episode coverage of "Don't F**K With Cats," "The Menendez Murders," "The Murder of Laci Peterson," "Casey Anthony: American Murder Mystery," "Serial," "The Jinx," "Making A Murderer," "The Staircase," "Lorena," "The Disappearance of Madeleine McCann," "OJ: Made in America." JOIN HERE!

DC FAM! There are still a few tickets available for our live show on March 28th with QUEENS RABIA CHAUDRY AND SUSAN SIMPSON! We're covering HBO's "The Case Against Adnan Syed." Get ticket here!
